title: Saint Paul's Church National Historic Site: Operating Hours & Seasons
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Operating Hours & Seasons              Operating Hours & Seasons       Saint Paul's Church National Historic Site is open Monday through Friday from 9:00 A.M. to 5:00 P.M., and usually the second Saturday of each month from noon to 4:00 PM. The exception is in the month of October when the site is open on the third Saturday. On the first Thursday of each month, the site will be open from 1:00 P.M. to 9:00 PM  Check the Program Schedule for additional dates and times that the site is open.  Â    We will be closed for the following Federal holidays: Thanksgiving Day, The fourth Thursday in November.  Christmas Day, December 25.  The site will be open on all other federal holidays.
